Class Solution

  • java.lang.Object
    • Solution

  • public class Solution
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a solution instance. Everything is based on inserting and removing lectures into the current timetable.

    • Field Summary

      • getCost

        public int getCost()
        Gets the total cost of the current state of the solution.
        Returns:
        - The total cost.

      • insertLecture

        public java.lang.Integer insertLecture(int room,
                              int day,
                              int period,
                              int courseID)
        Insert a given lecture into a given slot in the timetable.
        Parameters:
        room - - The room where the lecture should be inserted.
        day - - The day where the lecture should be inserted.
        period - - The period where the lecture should be inserted.
        courseID - - The course ID of the lecture that should be inserted.
        Returns:
        - The total cost after the insert OR null if the solution is infeasible.

      • removeLecture

        public java.lang.Integer removeLecture(int room,
                              int day,
                              int period)
        Remove a lecture from a given slot in the timetable.
        Parameters:
        room - - The room where the lecture should be removed.
        day - - The day where the lecture should be removed.
        period - - The period where the lecture should be removed.
        Returns:
        - The total cost after the remove OR null if the slot in the timetable was empty.

      • codeJudgeOutput

        public java.lang.String codeJudgeOutput()
        Creates the output in the format prescribed by codejudge.compute.dtu.dk.
        Returns:
        - The solution in the format prescribed by codejudge.compute.dtu.dk.

      • isCurriculaTaught

        public boolean isCurriculaTaught(int curriculum,
                        int day,
                        int period)
        Is the given curriculum being taught in the given timeslot. (Also validates timeslot)
        Parameters:
        curriculum - - The queried curriculum.
        day - - The queried day.
        period - - The queried period.
        Returns:
        - Whether the given curriculum is being taught in the given timeslot, and whether the timeslot is valid.
